No, but many of the features you would ordinarily need hcc for can be  
done directly in 2.0. Notably jobs can be completely configured and  
launched via JMX in 2.0.

-Paul

On Dec 10, 2007, at 11:03 AM, Sean Timm wrote:

> Is HCC compatible with Heritrix 2.0.0?
>
> -Sean
